description: This file implements interface functions related to TCP-based LPC call requests within the Ansc LPCCo Tcp Object, including initiation of calls and handling party address resolution.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpImcCallRequest(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * party_name,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,ANSC_HANDLE * phOutputBdo,PULONG pulErrorCode,ULONG ulTimeout)
methods.description: Issues a TCP-based LPC call request to a specified party, handling address resolution, connection establishment, and message exchange, with synchronization and timeout management.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpImcCallRequest2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,ANSC_HANDLE * phOutputBdo,PULONG pulErrorCode,ULONG ulTimeout)
methods.description: Similar to the above, but directly accepts a party address object instead of a party name, facilitating more direct call initiation.

ctags.name: AnscLpccoTcpImcCallRequest
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * party_name,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,ANSC_HANDLE * phOutputBdo,PULONG pulErrorCode,ULONG ulTimeout)

ctags.name: AnscLpccoTcpImcCallRequest2
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,ANSC_HANDLE * phOutputBdo,PULONG pulErrorCode,ULONG ulTimeout)
